mapper.select: select table_name , engine, table_comment , create_time from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = #{tableName}

select column_name columnName, data_type dataType, column_comment columnComment, column_key columnKey, extra from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position

select TABLE_CATALOG as table_catalog ,TABLE_SCHEMA as table_schema ,TABLE_NAME as table_name ,COLUMN_NAME as column_name ,ORDINAL_POSITION as ordinal_position ,COLUMN_DEFAULT as column_default ,IS_NULLABLE as is_nullable ,DATA_TYPE as data_type ,CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH as character_maximum_length
,COLUMN_TYPE as column_type ,COLUMN_KEY as column_key ,EXTRA as extra
,COLUMN_COMMENT as column_comment
from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position

select TABLE_CATALOG as table_catalog ,TABLE_SCHEMA as table_schema ,TABLE_NAME as table_name ,COLUMN_NAME as column_name ,ORDINAL_POSITION as ordinal_position ,COLUMN_DEFAULT as column_default ,IS_NULLABLE as is_nullable ,DATA_TYPE as data_type ,CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH as character_maximum_length
,COLUMN_TYPE as column_type ,COLUMN_KEY as column_key ,EXTRA as extra
,COLUMN_COMMENT as column_comment
from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position
